title: Jungle main looking for a VERY serious 5s team
body:
Hello, my name is Reyn time (previously Almost Mozart). I am known for my assassin based champion pool and my very aggressive playstyle, however I need a team to compliment/synergise with me and a team that I can synergise with. My main champions include: Rengar, Yi, Volibear, Udyr in the jungle and specific champs for other lanes, hence I regard myself as a jungle main (though I can play most champions well to some extent). 

If any teams of the community are happy to have me onboard, feel free to add me, 
IGN: Reyn time

replies.body: I dont want to be a party pooper >_> but if you want a "VERY serious" 5s team it will be very hard for you. I mean you might get in one but a diamond will come along and take your spot most likely. I'd suggest getting higher division before you go for super serious teams but I wish you luck!

You want me to get a higher rank.....when I've been stuck with really trashy teams. Although this excuse seems repetitive, you should take a look at the teams. Also, since when was serious 5s, exclusive so to speak?

Serious 5s isn't exclusive, by all means you could get into one. But most of the time a platinum won't be in a serious team for long because there will be a diamond with better mechanics, better champion pool and/or better game knowledge and they will kick you. It's happened to me multiple times and I am diamond lol. Good luck for finding a team that will keep you it will just be hard because you're only platinum
Plat 3 (was Plat 1, almost diamond mid-way through Season 5)
ill join even though im a level 8
